title: Ozempic For Weight Loss Is Disrupting Companies’ Business Model
description: Companies are weighing how much to factor the diabetes drugs increasingly being used for weight loss into their strategies.

title: Biden Condemns Terrorist Attacks In Israel, Offers Full U.S. Support
description: Biden said the U.S. stands by Israel and supports its right to defend itself in response to deadly surprise attacks by Hamas.

title: How $6 billion In Ukraine Aid Collapsed in a Government Funding Bill Despite Congress Support
description: The collapse of Ukraine aid in Congress was months in the making, and exactly what Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell had feared.

title: Two 6.3 Magnitude Earthquakes Kill At Least 15 in Western Afghanistan
description: Two 6.3 magnitude earthquakes killed at least 15 and injured nearly 40 others in western Afghanistan on Saturday, said a spokesperson for the country's national disaster authority.

title: Two 6.3 Magnitude Earthquakes Kill At Least 15 in Western Afghanistan
description: Two 6.3 magnitude earthquakes killed at least 15 and injured nearly 40 others in western Afghanistan on Saturday, said a spokesperson for the country's national disaster authority.

title: Israel Is ‘At War,’ Says Netanyahu. At Least 40 Killed In a Wide-Ranging Hamas Incursion
description: The ruling Hamas militant group in the Gaza Strip carried out an unprecedented attack on Israel at daybreak Saturday.
